note.p: Education: College de La Fleche; College Louis-le-Grand

Career: Travelled in Italy; served in the army; served in Flanders (1741); Aide-de-camp to Louis XV, Fontenoy; Lieutenant General (1747); Governor of Lorraine (1750); studied electricity; Grand Marechal of the court of King Stanislas (1752); retired to Franconville; edited and translated various works of literature
Memberships: Academy of Science, Paris (Free Associate 1750); Academy of Berlin
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Eloges des academiciens de l'Academie des Sciences [Paris]
